articles.title: 4th Conference of KPA Artillery Personnel Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
4th Conference of KPA Artillery Personnel Held in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The fourth conference of artillery personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Dec. 3 and 4.
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA, officers of artillery units and sub-units at all levels of the KPA, political officers, officers of military academies and officers and men of sub-units which set an example in the movement of crack shots including the members of the Hero Artillery Piece on Mu Islet.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un was present at the conference.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made an opening speech.
					
					 He said that the conference is of a great significance in glorifying the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the building of Juche-oriented artillery forces and perfectly rounding off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel as required by the modern warfare.
					
					 He declared the conference open, expressing the conviction that the conference would make success in its work thanks to high political enthusiasm and active participation of all its attendants and thus provide a historic landmark in rounding off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel and increasing the invincible might of the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The conference analyzed and reviewed the fulfillment of the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Il in his letter to the participants in the 3rd conference of KPA artillery personnel and successes, experience and lessons gained in the work of implementing the tasks set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) for the artillery field in recent years, and discussed measures for bringing about a drastic turn in rounding off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the conference.
					
					 Kim Jong Un delivered a speech at the conference.
					
					 He extended thanks to all the artillery personnel of the KPA who are standing guard over the sky, land and sea posts of the country along with their beloved artillery pieces even at the moment.
					
					 What is most important in rounding off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel is to conduct an ideological campaign all at once for making intensive and saturation firing for on-target impact and thus prepare them to be those strongest in mental power who do not abandon their revolutionary faith even though they may die, he noted.
					
					 He underscored the need to thoroughly carry out the party's policy of bringing about a turn in the training and make the flames of collective innovations rage in all the training grounds and focus efforts on raising the rate of hits.
					
					 In order to increase the power of artillery pieces, it is necessary to step up the work of modernizing artillery hardware as required by the modern warfare, he stressed.
					
					 As was taught by Kim Jong Il, a war is not declared in advance and, therefore, it is important to always keep a high alert in order to cope with any unexpected situation on one's own initiative, he said.
					
					 He called on all the commanding officers of the artillery units of the KPA to turn out as one in the struggle for rounding off the combat readiness with the unusual resolution and determination of a self-blasting fighter out for a final battle and thus create a heroic myth of Chollima speed at which they fulfill their mission for bolstering up artillery forces in a matter of one year instead of 10 years.
					
					 He also mentioned issues arising in firmly establishing the trait of attaching importance to the artillery in the whole army.
					
					 The supreme commander of the KPA expressed the conviction that all the artillery personnel would creditably fulfill their mission and duty they have assumed before the times and the revolution.
					
					 A letter of pledge to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the conference.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a closing speech.
					
					 He said that the fourth conference of KPA artillery personnel would be  brilliantly recorded in the history of building Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces as a historic conference, a conference for all-out advance of the artillery personnel as it brought about a fundamental turn in making artillery personnel fully combat-ready and ushering in a heyday in increasing the capabilities of the armed forces as required by the four strategic lines for building powerful armed forces set forth by the party and the prevailing situation.
					
					 He also called on all the participants in the conference to make charge full of confidence by holding fast to the important guidelines for increasing the capabilities of the artillery forces as clarified by the WPK and become pace-setters and vanguard in the struggle for greeting the 7th Congress of the WPK with shining achievements in increasing the might of the artillery forces.
					
					 He emphasized that a revolutionary turn would be sure to take place in rounding off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel as there are the correct guidance of the WPK and the heroic artillery personnel who are intensely loyal to the party.
					
					 Kim Jong Un declared the conference closed, expressing his firm belief that all the participants would fully embody the spirit of the conference and creditably discharge their sacred mission and duty they have assumed before the party, the revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 He extended warm militant salute to the participants in the conference, expressing his expectation and conviction that all of them would thoroughly round off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel amid the high-pitched movement for conducting intensive training in the spirit of Mt. Paektu and becoming crack shots and take the lead in ushering in a heyday in the drive for increasing the military capabilities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in 4th Conference of KPA Artillery Personnel
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in 4th Conference of KPA Artillery Personnel
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants in the fourth conference of artillery personnel of the KPA.
					 Acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of all the participants in the conference, he extended warm militant greetings to them.
					
					 Saying that the conference served as an important occasion in bringing about a revolutionary turn in rounding off the combat readiness of the artillery personnel by perfectly applying the Juche-oriented war method of the artillery as required by the modern war, true to the WPK's idea of attaching importance to the artillery, he warmly congratulated the participants and had a photo session with them.
					
					 At the end of the photo session, he waved back to the participants with broad smile on his face.
					
					 He expressed the belief that all the participants would bear in mind the fact that it is a duty and stance of the artillery personnel fully ready for a decisive battle to prepare themselves as crack shots and put fresh spurs to rounding off the combat readiness and thus fulfill their sacred mission and duty they have assumed before the country and revolution.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Greetings to Thai King
articles.content:
Greetings to Thai King
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Bhumibol Adulyadej, king of Thailand, on the occasion of the national day of Thailand, birthday of the king.
					 The message said he was pleased that the relations between the two countries were favorably developing this year marking the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations, and sincerely wished the king good health and happiness and the Thai people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Thai PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Thai PM
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Saturday sent a message of greeting to Thai Prime Minister Prayuth Chanocha on the occasion of the national day of the Kingdom of Thailand.
					 The message said that the mutual trust and understanding were deepened on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations with the Kingdom of Thailand would continue favorably developing on the principle of mutual benefits, the message wished the prime minister greater success in his responsible work for the political stability and economic development of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to his Thai counterpart Don Pramudwinai.

articles.title: Nepali President on Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Nepali President on Friendly Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- We should learn from the unbreakable single-minded unity of the DPRK around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Bidhya Devi Bhandari, president of Nepal, told Kim Yong Hak, DPRK ambassador to his country who paid a courtesy call on him on Dec. 1.
					
					 The president said:
					
					 The government and people of Nepal will boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in the future, too.
					
					 I wish to see Korea reunified peacefully free from foreign interference and the Korean people bigger successes in their struggle for achieving the country's prosperity and building an economic power.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Holds U.S. Accountable for Making Mideast Situation Complicated
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Holds U.S. Accountable for Making Mideast Situation Complicated
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Saturday gave the following answer to the question put by the KCNA as regards the complicated situation due to the war on terrorism in the Middle East:
					 The whole world is seized with fear of terrorism due to the vicious cycle of terrorism and counter-terrorism. A fierce war on terrorism is going on in Syria, a bomb attack downed a Russian airliner in Egypt, a series of terrorism occurred in France and hostage-taking incident took place at a Malian hotel.
					
					 Against this background, a Russian bomber, which was on the counter-terrorism operations at the request of the legitimate sovereign Syrian government, was shot down by a Turkish fighter, thus escalating criticism and arms build-up among various countries. The situation is growing tense with each passing day.
					
					 In fact, it was none other than the U.S. that made the "Islamic State" appear and let it reduce the Mideast to a theatre of terrorism.
					
					 The recent downing of the Russian bomber was a product of the U.S. crafty and sinister plot to scupper the hard-won international climate of cooperation in counter-terrorism and carry out its strategy for dominating the Mideast. 
					
					 It is a stereotyped method of the U.S. to fish in the troubled waters by inciting the ethnic and religious distrust and standoff.
					
					 The U.S. should be held entirely accountable for the escalated tension related to Syria.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its principled stand of opposing all forms of terrorism.
					
					 The DPRK also categorically rejects all the attempts to use terrorism for meeting sinister political purposes.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK SPA Leaves for Cambodia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK SPA Leaves for Cambodia
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK headed by its Vice-Chairman An Tong Chun left here on Saturday to take part in the 8th Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly to be held in Cambodia.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for France
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for France
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, and his party left here on Saturday to take part in the high-ranking officials' meeting of the UN Climate Change Conference to be held in Paris.

articles.title: Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through North Phyongan Province
 Pakchon, December 5 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of young vanguard passed through North Phyongan Province.
					 They arrived at Hyangsan County on Nov. 27 after passing through Jagang Province.
					
					 They were greeted by Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Jong Gon, chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Members of the relay group of young vanguard took over the red flag. They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Sinuiju City and the statue of Kim Il Sung in Hyangsan County and mosaics depicting their beaming images in Jongju City and other counties and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 They visited the Changsong Revolutionary Museum and the Yuphyong Revolutionary Site, etc. and enjoyed an art performance given by members of the art group of the house of culture of Changsong County.
					
					 They had a bonfire gathering. They attended a meeting held by youth and students in North Phyongan Province to vow their pledge.
					
					 They also had meetings with the ten party members in the Rakwon Machine Complex and participants in the 2nd national conference of young front-rankers in noble traits.
					
					 They toured the Revolutionary Museum in North Phyongan Province, Jongju Revolutionary Museum, Sinuiju Shoes Factory, Pakchon Silk Mill and other places.
					
					 They held diverse political and cultural events such as an oratorical meeting.

articles.title: Great Upsurge Effected for Greeting 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Great Upsurge Effected for Greeting 7th Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The announcement of the decision of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on convening the 7th Congress of the WPK gives a strong impetus to the general advance of the people for achieving the final victory of Songun revolution in the DPRK.
					 Amid the dynamic agitprop activities calling for greeting the 7th Congress with high political enthusiasm and unprecedented labor achievements, all the people have turned out in the campaign for increased production.
					
					 In the field of food industry alone, scores of establishments have been newly built or updated.
					
					 The Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory was fitted out with modern home-made equipment and the Jangjasan General Foodstuff Factory completed the project for the expansion of its production capacity. And factories under the Pyongyang Foodstuff Complex overfulfilled their yearly quotas.
					
					 A collective innovation movement led to an increased production at different silk and textile mills across the country.
					
					 The Pakchon Silk Mill hit the yearly plan tow months ahead of schedule and 150 spinners of the September Textile Mill accomplished their yearly plan and 15 of them two years' plan.
					
					 Coal mines in Anju and Tukjang areas hit their targets in November and those in South Hamgyong Province carried through their yearly plans.
					
					 The same is true of hydraulic and thermal power stations across the country.
					
					 The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex completed the modernization of over 10 production processes including hot rolling while the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex began home production of manganic ferroalloy.
					
					 Inspired by the news that a trial operation of the newly manufactured subway train was conducted with supreme leader Kim Jong Un on board, the working class in the field of railway transportation carried out the plan at 101.1 percent in November.
					
					 The Sunchon Chemical Complex succeeded in producing acryl resin paints and the Hungnam Chemical Complex has made great achievements in putting the production on a normal basis.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex manufactured the facilities to be installed at the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 in a little more than 10 days.
					
					 The Sunchon Cement Complex built anthracite gasification process based on the high-temperature air-combustion technology to mass-produce fire bricks.
					
					 A graphite production process went into operation at the Kwangchon Mine and the production is on a steady increase at the Tanchon Magnesia Factory.
					
					 The reconstruction of Samjiyon-Taehongdan-Paekam road came to an end and an e-library made its appearance in the seat of Hongwon County.
					
					 A process of producing synthetic grass was set up at the Wonsan Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory in Kangwon Province.
					
					 The DPRK athletes took gold medals in the 2015 AFC U-16 Women's Championship and the 2015 World Weightlifting Championship.
					
					 All the achievements made in November are attributable to the mental power of the Korean people advancing in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.

articles.title: Koryo Copper Mirror
articles.content:
Koryo Copper Mirror
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Copper mirrors dating back to Koryo Kingdom (918-1392) have been preserved at the Korean Central History Museum, the Koryo Museum and other museums in the country as one of national treasures.
					 Korea's mirror handicraft had a long tradition, starting from the age of Ancient Korea (early 30th century B.C.-108 B.C.), and further developed during Koryo Kingdom. In the period of Koryo Kingdom, copper mirror was handcrafted.
					
					 Koryo copper mirrors were discovered at old tombs and temples in different parts of the country, including Kaesong City.
					
					They are diverse in shape with refined relief patterns on their backs.
					
					Typical of the patterns are those depicting animals, plants and sceneries.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Nuclear Proliferation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Nuclear Proliferation
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. exchanged a diplomatic memorandum for officially putting into force the revised version of "atomic energy agreement" with the south Korean authorities on Nov. 25.
					 This has touched off censure at home and abroad as it is a serious and criminal nexus escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The effectuation of the revised version of the agreement would enable south Korea to more openly carry out the reprocessing of spent nuclear fuel and uranium enrichment which they have so far carried out in secrecy, and justify the moves for the development of nuclear weapons.
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. openly loosened the "rope" which bound up south Korea for mere form's sake as regards uranium enrichment and reprocessing of spent fuel.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are shouting with joy that the "recent agreement paved a way for uranium enrichment and the reprocessing of spent nuclear fuel after the lapse of more than four decades."
					
					 The U.S. is the chief culprit of nuclear proliferation as it has further increased the danger of nuclear arms race and a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. already signed deceptive "atomic energy agreement" with south Korea far back in the 1950s and has connived at the south Korean authorities' nuclear development under the signboard of "nuclear control".
					
					 When a sign of having extracted plutonium was detected in atomic reactors in 1998 and 2003 and when it was disclosed in 2000 that south Korea developed uranium enrichment facilities and extracted high-concentration uranium thrice, the U.S. shielded south Korea, claiming "it is not a matter of big concern as it is just an academic experiment."
					
					 The U.S. has put the nuclear development of south Korea under its control through annual meeting of the U.S.-south Korea joint atomic energy cooperation committee.
					
					 The recent effectuation of the agreement rendered south Korea's development of nuclear weapons legal. Through this the U.S. threw away its mask under which it has systematically transferred sensitive technology, personnel and hardware needed for the nuclear development to south Korea behind the scene and fully disclosed its true colors as a chief culprit of nuclear proliferation.
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. is to let south Korea stand on the forefront of the nuclear stand-off with the DPRK and thus easily pursue its aggressive policy towards the DPRK and its strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 In order to calm down the international community critical of the revision of the "atomic energy agreement" the U.S. is letting loose groundless rubbish that south Korea is "faithfully honoring its obligations, pursuant to the declaration on denuclearization" and south Korea's development of nuclear weapons is "technically impossible" under the "atomic energy agreement," etc.
					
					 But the international community is seriously concerned about the moves for nuclear development that is becoming a reality in several countries including Japan and Israel as well as south Korea and several regions including Europe at the connivance of the U.S and under its patronage.
					
					 The U.S. is now left with neither justification nor pretext to find fault with the nuclear program of others including the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula which surfaced and has become ever more serious due to its moves.
					
					 The U.S. can never evade its responsibility as a chief culprit of nuclear proliferation and nuclear arms race.

articles.title: S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Declares All-Out Action to Counter Police Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Declares All-Out Action to Counter Police Suppression
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a press conference outside the building of the "National Assembly" on Dec. 1 at which it declared it would counter the police's campaign for arresting its chairman with an all-out action, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 At the press conference, the organization disclosed that the police are mulling hurling repressive forces into the Jogye Temple where he has taken refuge to arrest him.
					
					 If the police storms into the temple, they would launch the all-out action, it noted.
					
					 It also warned the "Saenuri Party" that the KCTU would not remain an onlooker to the party's moves to railroad the labor bill through the "National Assembly" within this year despite the unanimous protest of the workers.

articles.title: All-out People's Action Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-out People's Action Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People Friday in an editorial called for all-out people's action for democracy.
					 The editorial recalled that the present "government" hurled huge police forces into suppressing even old persons by use of water cannon, much upset by the first all-out people's action in which more than 150 000 people took part.
					
					 The "government" committed wholesale search and suppression of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and even turned down the application for rallies, the editorial noted, adding this is reminiscent of the past period of dictatorship.
					
					 The all-out people's action means a grand chorus of the people protesting against the present "regime's" moves to retrogressively revise the labor law, introduce "state-compiled" history textbook and sidestep the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, it stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Regime Accused of Fascist Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Regime Accused of Fascist Action
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group is getting frantic with the operation to put down the struggle against the unpopular rule, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency on Nov. 30 declared that police would spray colored dye on those who do not comply with their demand at the time of rally and demonstration to confirm their participation and arrest them on the spot in the future.
					
					 They also threatened to set up police cordons with buses if protesters occupy streets and stage excessive march or demonstration. 
					
					 It was the fascist police authorities, who created a terror-ridden atmosphere around the venues of rallies and demonstrations of south Korean people demanding democracy and the right to live by hurling huge police forces and indiscriminately arrested them while firing tear liquid and water cannon at peaceful demonstrators.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Ensure Freedom of Rally and Demonstration
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Ensure Freedom of Rally and Demonstration
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Members of the Pusan Headquarters of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting in Pusan on Dec. 2 at which they demanded the authorities ensure the freedom of rally and demonstration.
					 They recalled that a peasant was put into a critical condition by policeman's brutal suppression during a rally held as part of the all-out people's action but the "government" labeled the actions of the people from all walks of life "violent demonstrations."
					
					 They strongly demanded the regime guarantee the rights of people. At the end of the meeting its participants staged a demonstration towards the Pusan City Office of the "Saenuri Party."

articles.title: S. Korean Reverends Denounce Authorities' Violent Suppression of All-out People's Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Reverends Denounce Authorities' Violent Suppression of All-out People's Action
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- 164 reverends in Taejon City, Sejong City and in the areas of South Chungchong Province held a press conference on Dec. 3 at which they released a declaration on the situation denouncing the authorities for violently putting down the November 14 all-out people's action, according to Thongil News, south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The declaration accused the present "regime" of pressing for the introduction of "state-compiled" history textbook despite public opposition.
					
					 They blasted the chief executive for her reckless demeanor labeling the protesters against the introduction of the textbook as "enemies," branding their acts as "terrorism" and declaring a war against them.
					
					 The purpose of the "state-compiled" textbook is to embellish "yusin" dictatorship and make the conservative "regime" permanently stay in power, they held.
					
					 They urged the chief executive to own responsibility for suppressing the people and call on Paek Nam Gi's family to make an apology and demanded the police agency chief step down.
					
					 They will work hard to ensure without fail that the second all-out people's action is staged by the workers and peasants subject to pain due to the incompetent "regime," stressed the declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Ruling Forces for Creating Terror-ridden Atmosphere
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Ruling Forces for Creating Terror-ridden Atmosphere 
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore carried an editorial on Dec. 1 denouncing the present ruling forces for reviving the terror-ridden atmosphere dating back to the period of "yusin" dictatorship.
					 The editorial noted:
					
					 Pak Song Su, a social activist, has been behind bars for seven months for scattering leaflets critical of the present chief executive.  
					
					 Last month, more than ten policemen made all sorts of threats against a citizen who displayed literature such as words "daughter of dictator" on the window.
					
					 These are crimes violating human rights as they are aimed to gag the people and media by reviving the terror-ridden atmosphere dating back to the period of "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: S. Korean People's Actions against Authorities' Unpopular Rule Unabated
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Actions against Authorities' Unpopular Rule Unabated
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- South Korean people of different social standings are escalating their actions against the unpopular rule of the conservative group. 
					 The Federation of Peasants Associations, the Federation of Women Peasants Associations and other peasants' organizations of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the "National Assembly" on November 30 in demand of the stop to the moves for "Free Trade Agreement" aiming at violating the right to existence. 
					
					 Speakers there said the authorities are busy with concluding "FTA" with outside forces in disregard of the peasants' right to existence though foreign farm products are flooding most of the south Korean markets. 
					
					 The speakers warned that if the "regime" and the "NA" conclude the "FTA," turning a deaf ear to the demand of the peasants, they would face strong resistance. 
					
					 On the same day the chairman of the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea launched one-man demonstration in front of the building of the "NA" in Youido, Seoul. 
					
					 He declared that he would continue the demonstration till December 9 in demand of the withdrawal of the bill for retrogressive revision of the labor law.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Swiss committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Nov. 28 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the hero and benefactor of the nation.
					
					 He made tireless efforts for the happiness and well-being of the people, the building of a thriving socialist nation and Korea's reunification all his life.
					
					 He formulated Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism on the basis of the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a socialist fortress of the world.
					
					 He performed undying feats in the efforts to accomplish the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 Thanks to his bold decision the north-south summits were held and the June 15 joint declaration, landmark of Korea's reunification, and October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were adopted.
					
					 The era of the June 15 reunification and the idea of By Korean Nation Itself were provided thanks to his ardent patriotism.
					
					 He successfully put into practice the three charters for national reunification advanced by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He regarded the idea of believing in people as in Heaven as his motto and worked heart and soul for improving the people's living standard till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Since his demise the Korean people have held him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- There took place events in various countries on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They included a seminar on his work in Mexico, remembrance meeting, photo exhibition and film show in Austria and lecture and opening of the week of photo exhibition in Nigeria on Nov. 28 and 30.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were also works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing the successes made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched a Korean film introducing immortal flower Kimjongilia.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, explained the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" and referred in detail to the fact that he developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the invincible revolutionary party and smashed the imperialist allied forces' moves for aggression and firmly defended the country's sovereignty and dignity with the invincible Songun politics.
					
					 Eduard Knapp, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as the leader of the people who dedicated his all to the DPRK's prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					 They extended full support to the army and people of the DPRK in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country independently and peacefully, saying that the Korean people are registering big successes in building a rich and powerful country day by day under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, faithful successor to the cause of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Denounce Anti-DPRK Campaign of S. Korean Conservative Media
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Denounce Anti-DPRK Campaign of S. Korean Conservative Media 
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on Nov. 28 denounced the south Korean conservative media for conducting an anti-DPRK smear campaign under the patronage of the south Korean authorities.
					 The statement accused the south Korean Yonhap News of letting loose on Nov. 25 unspeakable invectives against the DPRK, asserting that it is pursuing a "horror policy" and "authoritarian policy".
					
					 This is an intolerable insult to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and a serious politically-motivated provocation to drive the north-south relations into a catastrophe.
					
					 This smear campaign is being openly conducted under the undisguised backstage manipulation of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 The reckless propaganda conducted by the south Korean conservative media just before the working contact for the talks between authorities of the north and the south proves that the pro-U.S. regime in south Korea is not interested in improving the north-south relations as it was a deliberate and premeditated provocation intended to derail the process for mending the ties.
					
					 It is the fixed stand and will of the DPRK that nothing can be solved with those keen on doing harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 In fact, it is the present south Korean regime which enforces a horror and dictatorial policy as it is keen to revive the fascist "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Myanmar
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- We join the world progressives in paying highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.
					 The Myanmar committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il said this in a press release issued at its inaugural ceremony on Nov. 26.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 On the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il many foreign countries are organizing remembrance committees to highly praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il who dedicated his whole life to the prosperity of the DPRK, people's happiness and human cause of independence. 
					
					 The Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar formally inaugurated a Myanmar committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il on Nov. 26, 2015.
					
					 The remembrance committee extends firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country by carrying out Kim Jong Il's behests under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were figures of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed at the building of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on Nov. 26.
					 Tha Win, member of the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and member of the parliament, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set December as the remembrance month and organize political events such as a remembrance meeting, round-table talks, film show and photo exhibition during the period.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Czech Republic, Italy
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed in Czech Republic, Italy
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in the Czech Republic and Italy on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il on Nov. 28 and 29.
					 Iri Vabr, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il was a model of world revolutionaries. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and defended and strengthened socialist Korea, holding higher the banner of Songun in the light of the extreme moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK at the end of the last century.
					
					 What should be emphasized among his exploits were the feats he performed for the cause of national reunification, he added.
					
					 Miriam Pellegrini Ferri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty, said that Kim Jong Il, born in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu during the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle, grew up to be a great revolutionary. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il thoroughly applied the Juche idea to the revolution and construction.
					
					 He was the outstanding leader who performed immortal exploits for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving national reunification and the global cause of independence.
					
					 The DPRK is shedding its brilliant rays as a bulwark for accomplishing the global cause of socialism. This would be unthinkable without his exploits.
					
					 It is my hope that the people of the DPRK will greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with bigger successes for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige IV Conferencia de Artilleros de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige IV Conferencia de Artilleros de EPC
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 3 y 4 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la IV Conferencia de Artilleros del Ejercito Popular de Corea bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					   En el acto estuvieron presentes Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los comandantes y funcionarios politicos de las unidades y subunidades artilleras a todos niveles del EPC, funcionarios de las academias militares, los miembros del canon Heroe de la isla Mu, comandantes y militares ejemplares en el movimiento de artilleros certeros.
					
					   El Comandante Supremo pronuncio las palabras inaugurales.
					
					  Subrayo que el presente conclave tiene gran significacion en glorificar las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en materia de la construccion de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas artilleras y en perfeccionar los preparativos de combate de los artilleros segun la demanda de la guerra moderna.
					
					  Convencido de que la presente conferencia servira de un jalon historico en completar los preparativos de combate de los artilleros y fortalecer el poderio invencible de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas al cumplir suficientemente sus labores con el elevado entusiasmo politico y la participacion activa de todos los integrantes, el Comandante Supremo proclamo la inauguracion del conclave.
					
					  En la conferencia fueron analizados y balanceados los exitos, experiencias y lecciones alcanzados en las labores para materializar las tareas presentadas por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la rama de artilleria, y discutidas las medidas para registrar un nuevo cambio en la complementacion de los preparativos de combate de los artilleros.
					
					Hubo un informe e intervenciones.
					
					El Comandante Supremo pronuncio un discurso.
					
					Lo mas importante en perfeccionar los preparativos de combate de los artilleros, es convertirlos en los fuertes en la fuerza espiritual, que no renuncian el credo en la revolucion aunque mueran, al darles una educacion ideologica certera, intensa y sucesiva, senalo.
					
					Enfatizo la necesidad de materializar cabalmente la orientacion del Partido en materia de la revolucion en el entrenamiento para que se levantara una fuerte oleada de renovacion colectiva en los ejercicios artilleros y agrego que es preciso enfocar la fuerza en elevar el porcentaje de impacto del fuego artillero.
					
					Es necesario impulsar activamente las labores para modernizar los pertrechos artilleros de acuerdo con la demanda de la guerra moderna, puntualizo.
					
					Como decia el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la guerra se estalla sin anunciar el tiempo, menciono y enfatizo en que hay que mantener siempre el estado de alerta para enfrentar con iniciativa con cualquier situacion inesperada.
					
					Y apunto que todos los miembros de mando de artilleria del Ejercito Popular deben levantarse unanimemente en la lucha para completar los preparativos combativos con decision extraordinaria del soldado en visperas del combate final y crear el mito heroico de la velocidad de Chollima de cumplir en un ano las tareas de 10 anos en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas artilleras.
					
					Y destaco la necesidad de establecer firmemente el ambiente de dar importancia a la artilleria en todo el ejercito.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso la conviccion de que todos los artilleros del Ejercito Popular cumpliran con exito la mision y el deber asumidos ante la epoca y la revolucion.
					
					En la conferencia fue adoptado un juramento dirigido al Comandante Supremo.
					
					El Comandante Supremo pronuncio el discurso de clausura.
					
					Enfatizo que la IV Conferencia de Artilleros del EPC se registrara brillantemente en la historia de construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del Juche como una conferencia historica y la de marcha general de artilleria que trajo el cambio radical en la preparacion combativa de los artilleros conforme a las 4 lineas estrategicas del partido encaminadas a hacer del EPC el ejercito poderoso y la demanda de la situacion creada y preparo nuevo jalon en abrir la nueva era dorada en el fortalecimiento del poderio militar.
					
					Exhorto que todos los participantes en la conferencia tienen que avanzar con la conviccion tomando firmemente la guia programatica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea por el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas de artilleria y, de esta manera, deben ser jinetes y vanguardias en la lucha para acoger el Septimo Congreso de nuestro partido con los exitos brillantes del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas artilleras.
					
					Subrayo que por contar con la direccion del PTC y los artilleros heroicos infinitamente fieles a nuestro partido, se lograra sin falta un viraje revolucionario en los preparativos combativos de artilleria.
					
					Expresando la conviccion firme de que todos los participantes cumpliran exitosamente la sagrada mision y deber asumidos ante el Partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo al materializar cabalmente el espiritu de la presente conferencia, el Mariscal declaro la clausura de IV Conferencia de Artilleros del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					El Mariscal envio el cordial saludo combativo a todos los participantes mostrandoles la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos perfeccionaran cabalmente los preparativos combativos de artilleria desplegando el fervor de entrenamiento del Paektu y desarrollando el movimiento de artilleros certeros y se pondran al frente de la lucha para abrir la era dorada del fortalecimiento del poderio militar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografía con participantes en conferencia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografía con participantes en conferencia
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejército Popular de Corea, tomó fotografía de recuerdo junto a los participantes en la Cuarta Conferencia de Artilleros del EPC.
					Cuando el Mariscal llegó al lugar de filmación, todos los participantes lo acogieron con efusivas aclamaciones.
					
					El Mariscal respondió con la mano levantada a las fervientes aclamaciones de los participantes y les dio el caluroso saludo combativo.
					
					Felicitó calurosamente a los participantes diciendo que el presente cónclave deviene un motivo importante que registrará un cambio revolucionario en la labor para perfeccionar los preparativos de la batalla artillera materializando cabalmente el autóctono método de batalla artillera conforme a la demanda de la guerra contemporánea en pleno acato a la idea del partido de dar importancia a la artillería. Y tomó fotografía de recuerdo junto a los participantes.
					
					Después de terminada la filmación, el Mariscal con amplia sonrisa agitó cordialmente la mano hacia los participantes.
					
					Manifestó una convicción de que todos los participantes darán más acicate a la perfección de los preparativos de combate sin olvidar ni un momento la sagrada misión y el deber concedidos por la época y la revolución.
					
					Le acompañaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil y otros miembros directivos del EPC.

articles.title: Salen de Pyongyang canciller y su comitiva hacia Francia
articles.content:
Salen de Pyongyang canciller y su comitiva hacia Francia
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Partieron el dia 5 de esta capital el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, y su comitiva para participar en la reunion de los funcionarios de alto rango de la Conferencia del Cambio Climatico de la ONU, que se efectuara en Paris, Francia.

articles.title: Responsabilidad por agravacion de situacion en torno a Siria recae sobre EE.UU.
articles.content:
Responsabilidad por agravacion de situacion en torno a Siria recae sobre EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se crea una situacion complicada en el Medio Oriente en torno a la guerra antiterrorista, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 5 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					En la actualidad se libra una furiosa guerra antiterrorista en Siria, mientras ocurrieron en Egipto el accidente de explosion de avion de pasajeros de Rusia, en Francia los casos sucesivos terroristas, en un hotel de Mali el incidente de rehenes, etc. 
					
					Debido a esta circulacion viciosa del terrorismo y antiterrorismo, todo el mundo esta preso del panico. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, un cazabombardero ruso que volaba para participar en la guerra antiterrorista segun la demanda del gobierno de Siria, legitimo Estado soberano, fue derribado por las fuerzas aereas turcas. Este incidente provoca la campana de censura y el aumento armamentista entre algunos paises. 
					
					Precisamente EE.UU. es el autor que habia creado el "Estado islamico" y convirtio el Medio Oriente en la escena caotica del terrorismo. 
					
					El presente caso de derribo de cazabombardero ruso es tambien el producto de la intencion astuta del imperio de romper el ambiente de cooperacion antiterrorista internacional que se crea a duras penas y lograr la estrategia de dominacion sobre el Medio Oriente.
					
					Aprovecharse de la desconfianza y confrontacion entre naciones y entre religiones es el metodo rutinario de EE.UU. 
					
					Toda la responsabilidad por la agravacion de la situacion en torno a Siria recae enteramente sobre EE.UU. 
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea mantiene la invariable posicion de principios contra el terrorismo de todas formas. 
					
					Rechazamos fuertemente las tentativas de utilizar el terrorismo en los designios politicos malintencionados.
